reviews.review_msg: She is very rude and irresponsible. The grading system is also ambiguous. At the end, you will gain nothing from this course.

Speak in class, communicate and discuss, ask questions, read the papers, and comment to them, you will get a good mark. Unclear grading scheme. Difficult course but possible to get a good grade with lots of work. She is very knowledgeable about Genetic Algorithms and she is one of the best in that aspect. If you did not read the paper, she knows.

The worst professor I've ever seen in my academic life. She put clear racial discrimination in her grading system. She is very impolite and irresponsible. The scoring system is totally baseless and unclear. Do not waste your time. WORST PROFESSOR FOR EVER!!

She has a clear preference for teaching harder subjects as she is a world expert in fields of computational techniques and possibly THE expert in social learning. She likes to talk and you need to talk back. Tough concepts were explained very clearly and the class average was A-. Course was a bit freeform but had a lot of "freebie" marks.
